content: {"name": "CHCF/ Iglesia de Dios de La Profecia Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* The church opens its doors early at 8:05am to register walk-ins.\n* Only one bag of groceries and produce per recipient. Unless they have proof of working as a home attendant, and provide the patient's ID, then they are provided an additional bag of groceries with produce.", "email": "", "url": "", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "387 South 1st street", "address_2": null, "city": "Brooklyn", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "11211", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.710381, "longitude": -73.951637}, "phones": [{"number": "(212) 206-1090", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "14:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
